page.title: 12RECREATION- SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: CONTINUED FROM PAGE 11. {The Rock Gardens}has a children's playground as well as the gardens. {West End Park}also has a children's play ground .There is also a large grassed open space which is sometimes used for fairs. {The Regis Centre}offers Keep Fit, evening classes and other forms of entertainment. {The Yacht Club}has been open for thirty seven years.There are seven hundred members at present.To join the club you need to be proposed by a member.The facilities that they offer are sailing,speed boating, fishing and windsurfing. Also in our area there is a{Scrabble {Club,}a{Volley Ball Club}for women and a{Lawn Tennis Club.
